reproduction.crash_signature: arc.state op operand type mismatch - garbage type value (memory corruption)
reproduction.notes: The reproduced error manifests as garbage type values (e.g., i842160528) appearing in arc.state operands instead of valid hw.array<16xi8> type. This is consistent with the original root cause in ConstantOp::create where type casting fails, likely due to type corruption or uninitialization in the HW dialect type handling during arcilator processing.
